author: ET CONTRIBUTORS
title: View: Disinformation in times of a pandemic, and the laws around it
description: As the world wrestles with a pandemic caused by a new coronavirus, COVID-19, the authorities around the world are forced to face an avalanche of false news about the virus on digital platforms. Even though India does not have a specific law to deal with menac…
content: By Khushbu Jain & Brijesh SinghThe world has been battling a deluge of misinformation and influence operations for a long time now. The advent of internet, social media platforms and real time messengers has given a free run to criminals, miscreants, nati… [+9614 chars]
